title: Wealth Management Business Analyst at Open Systems Technologies (New York City, NY)
text: Source: BullhornReach.com This application is an existing application that is used to produce the monthly client statements. This position offers a unique opportunity to work in a highly visible area and gain an in-depth understanding of the Wealth Management brokerage business by interfacing with numerous business and technical areas. You would be part of an existing team, helping to clarify requirements necessary to enhance the functionality of this existing application. This work would involve participation across all aspects of the software development life cycle. Duties / Responsibilities: Analysis, documenting and support of the requirements for the Statements projects Work with the key stakeholders from Statements Business, Operations and Technology to implement solutions Troubleshoot issues, solving independently or escalating to the Development team and Business owners Proactively identify new opportunities and act on them, including identifying automation opportunities Maintain and continuously improve control procedures to ensure successful delivery of Statements projects Coaching / mentoring of business analyst team Implementation of business analysis standard practices Review of requirements documents produced by business analysts Participation in work and resource planning activities Skills Required: ~10 years working on IT related projects, with business analysis experience Familiar with all stages of the development life cycle including analysis, design, development, deployment and support Strong verbal and written communication skills Interest and proficiency in working with large and disparate data and sources Good organization, communication and interpersonal skills Self-starter with a can-do approach and strong client focus Methodical problem solver Excellent presentation skills including oral and written communication skills Exposure to Financial processes and/or Financial Reporting Client Regulatory Reporting experience a plus Worked in Financial Services/Brokerage industry Personable, able to interface with clients, peers and managers Enthusiastic, motivated team player
